result.reason: Fullscreen connections report/use an understated resolution, likely due to incorrect screen bounds or DPI scaling not being applied when switching to fullscreen mode.
result.approach: Audit fullscreen resolution detection: use Screen.FromControl() or Screen.FromHandle() to get the correct monitor bounds, apply DPI scaling factor (Graphics.DpiX/Y or DeviceDpi), and pass the corrected width/height to the RDP ActiveX control before entering fullscreen.
